title: My pixel cannot enter the system after a factory data reset and it stay in the Big "G" screen
content:
This morning I update the system to Android Q, this afternoon, I find my fringerprint cannot be recognized. So I try to set a new one fringprint ID, but the setting program was brokenning down. I have been feedback this problem in my pixel. 
Then i locked my phone, when i tried to unlock it, put the right pattern on the unlock screen. With the screen flashing, the screen back to the unlock screen, the second time the right pattern input but the screen flashing and back again.
For slove this problem, a factory data reset was taked. When reset completing, the reboot behaviour is staying in the big "G" screen.
How to slove this problem? Any body can help me!
Thank you!
